idea-plugin.name: Git Status Indicator
idea-plugin.description:
Shows two colored indicators in the status bar for Git repository status.

Automatically adapts to your PhpStorm settings:
  • Works with ChangeLists (default mode)
  • Works with Git Staging Area (if enabled in Settings → Version Control → Git)
First circle (Changes):
  • Gray = no changes
  • Green = changes ready to commit
  • Red inner circle = untracked files
Second circle (Push status):
  • Gray = all commits pushed
  • Blue = unpushed commits
Click the indicator to open the Commit window.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
1.2.0
  • Now respects PhpStorm's "Enable staging area" setting
  • Works with ChangeLists when staging area is disabled (default)
  • Works with Git staging when staging area is enabled
  • Red inner circle indicates untracked files
1.1.0
  • Added second indicator for unpushed commits (blue = unpushed, gray = all pushed)
  • Improved status display with two separate circles
1.0.0
  • Initial release
  • Shows uncommitted changes indicator in status bar
